posts.title: What Musk and Ramaswamy could’ve easily said which MAGA would agree with. No clue why they took the approach they did.
posts.content: H1-B needs major reform and has a ton of abuse. We need to crack down on the abuse and make the overall pool smaller while reinforcing/increasing selection of the best/brightest candidates who contribute to society. LEGAL immigration is good for the best/brightest AND those who share America’s ideals…and we MUST end ALL illegal immigration.

posts.title: Reframe the H1B Debate - One Against Two Is Unfair
posts.content:
The debate is not one American against one H1B Visa Foreigner. The real debate is one American against two H1B Visa Foreigners. If an H1B employee costs half as much as an American employee, then a corporation can hire two H1B employees for your job.

Framing the conversation as one American against one H1B Foreigner implies a fair fight whereas one American against two H1B Foreigners shows the reality, it's unfair. We have to literally be twice as productive as our competition to be hired or retain our jobs. And even if we do, then our raises are suppressed.

Anyone who works in tech knows the average American is more productive than the average H1B Foreigner, but competing against two people who have no right to be here is unfair.
posts.raw_content:

posts.author: madisonmaga

posts.title: Note to Trump Admin: Better pay american IT workers what their worth and block foreign insourcing, otherwise you're going to find out just how "lazy", "unskillful" those that built all these systems really are, as they learn CIA cyber dirtytrix and hack us gov, corps "from China", "Russia", DPRK...
posts.content:
The absolute arrogance of the boomer generation absolutely astounds me.

They say "Gen z are all lazy and stupid". "They don't want to work"

This "They don't want to work" narrative is a canard. They DO want to work. They don't want to be exploited like GenX was (mine), employed as fulltime, salaried, exempt, and made to work 'in crisis mode' all the time, desperately both trying to code; attend POINTLESS meetings as stochastic terrorism on your deadlines; trying to fix the last 2 guys' code; secure the systems; and document what you did meticulously using nanny language so that your work clients don't misinterpret the terse highly technical words as "snarky", "dismissive" or "arrogant" rather than the work of a borderline autist.

They DONT want to work 60 hours a week all the time and get paid 40

American "gen z" workers DONT want to have to go back to physical brick and mortar workplace after learning how to work remotely and investing 5000 dollars on an office in their home and enjoying the free costs of at-home daycare for their children (and savings on gas, losing up to 2 hours a day commuting). Having to come back to the office based on your manager's extreme narcissism and limited empathy. IS this person going to pay your life insurance since you're risking your life behind the wheel 2 hrs a day again? They should.

How dare they. They forced you home for COVID, you changed everything. Now they want to force you back. Fuck you, Upton Sinclair. You fuck. (I know that doesn't make sense to anyone but me)

Any wife whose husband died in a car accident after being forced to come back to work should sue the company for millions of dollars. MILLIONS.

American 'gen z' workers DONT want work fridays. They want longer weekends. But they know the work has to be done. If you require office, then why not 2-3 extra hours per day. Since you've already WASTED A DAY on your workplace.

This is a negotiation right now. People want 3 day weekends

They want what those countries with "The highest happiness indices" have

Why shouldn't they? America was not built for corporations to wageenslave humanity. Neither was Japan.

People want to enjoy their lives.

You boomer FUCKSHITS are calling this "Lazy" I want to kick you in your god damned words so hard that it erases those words from your very vocabulary.

Sorry for the violence. But seriously, you guys need a reality check.

And its always these teachers and cops and paygraded people that are saying this. These people are the most statusquotarian people who are in high demand and yet their job is easy or pays well.

Like fuckin' physical therapists. Or people who wash dogs and charge 200 dollars an hour. Or board them into a tiny stinky dogroom like temporary dogjail for inconvenienced owners who don't know how to train their dog not to bark and don't know how to put their dog in the fenced backyard.

This is turning into an epic rant on everything. Sorry / thanks for indulging me.

I am basically hating my parents generation on this particular topic.

I worked very hard, and I'm semi retired now. I know the absolute demoralization of the modern workplace, even for and esp IT jobs like sysadmin, it support, security professional or web developer.

I am giving the Trump admin a severe warning

If this bullshit with the insourcing continues, you're going to force people into crime

Cybercrime

The most skillful are going to be recruited by foreign groups for security. I know because I was offered a cyber security with a spook adjacent firm in Germany but I had to move to Germany. And also, the people scared the ever living shoit out of me. And these online gambling fuckers too, they wanted me to work on their startup company. Shady as absolute F. And finally, these online art dealers which was a cover for weapons moving out of portland. Run run run away.

This is what I had to deal with when I couldn't find a "real" professional job, and I had to work in a grocery store in boulder colorado because the startup I was working for did not pay me for 3 mo of work (it imploded, no fault of my own as I was in dev not financial, I gave deliverables steadily so I could use it on my resume),. But i was coding for hours at night and working for grocery. Dog tired. And getting offers from weird ass shady people. This is from a person who was told many times my resume was impressive and that launching severl data driven startup websites and coding them was impressive that my education was impressive etc.

This is happening now with others.

They are going to turn to cybercrime

They will be recruited overseas by the thousandtalents or confucktious instute or whatever. They will work from anywhere on earth, they will use vpns, TOR, blockchain, monero, they will launch crowdfunded assassinations platforms which WILL happen. They will become as popular as prediciton markets

CIA will try to shut them down. They won't be able to.

They will star picking off CIA people one by one unless Trump admin shuts it down or fundamentally changes their mission to abandon assassinations and regime change overseas and stops DEWing our own people or engagin in weather manipulation and targetting individuals, killing cancer/new energy scientists, etc

American IT professionals are actually much better than many overseas.

The overseas people are managers of their own people who are mid-skillfuls whose deliverables are SO HORRIFIC that I've had to gut entire systems and install more modern open source systems and tailor those to replace them.

They give shitty codebases without any documentation, and someone is accepting this. It takes a lot more effort to fix this shit india code than to simply take the pain of spinning up a digital ocean instance or AWS and putting open source on it, tailoring it, and then running it parallel as a dev server until your own people can sign off on it, test the snot out of it and switch over.

Everyone in software / web development knows this is a fact. They have no problem with some East Indian manager who actually knows how to code better than they do, and speaks fine English. None. In fact, people ADORE dev managers who are better coders than them. They feel like they've "EARNED" Their managemnet position, and we LEARN from them. No one likes or respects a dev manager who cannot in any way relate to the unique problems they are solving every day, while being pulled away from coding by a coworker dipshit who is stuck on some html thing they for some reason can't figure out themselves by reading the manual

Rant mostly complete

Thanks for listening
